column1: Figure 8: Change in population by Urban Rural Classification, mid-2010 to mid-2020
1) Population change for each area shown as an index with the 2010 population as a base of 100. For example, the figure for 2020 Large Urban Area of 106.9 represents a 6.9% increase over 2010.
2) Based on Scottish Government 6-fold Urban Rural Classification 2016.
